content.rendered:
NEW JACQUEMUS MUST-HAVE ACCESSORIES

French fashion designer Simon Porte Jacquemus started 2020 with a bang.

Jacquemus’ Fall 2020 show immediately became a top industry favorite. As a result of its A-list models and crowds from around the world, Jacquemus made a name for himself amongst the most adored designers today. 

The collection was mostly neutral with pops of vibrant pink and layers of divine lavender. The color-story quickly became the focal point of the show, in addition to incredibly thoughtful, unique accessories paired with each look.

Fresh Accessories

Open-toed heels with straps, booties with chunky heels, and a combination of men’s boots and sneakers add a range of interesting, modern footwear. Likewise, Jacquemus offers a selection of sleek, minimalist jewelry and wearable headwear to compliment the rest of his collection.

One of the most exciting parts of the Jacquemus line is the fun, mini bags that double as accessories. They can be worn as bracelets, belts, and crossbody bags. Above all, each bag adds a distinct level of style to every look they’re paired with.

His iconic handbags are wildly popular, and as a result, most bags sell out within moments. Thanks to their fresh designs, these bags have become a perfect collector’s item that can be passed down from generation to generation. 

I recommend investing in one now to enjoy for years to come. The price points for the most recent collection are very reasonable with some handbags priced around just $200 dollars.

Jacquemus and Accessibility

In a Vogue interview with Lynn Yaeger, Jacquemus says, “With every collection, I’m finding the right balance between conceptual and spatial and something that’s wearable. It’s really important to me to be true to my market.”

Most importantly, Jacquemus strives to make his designs attainable for his many fans. In another Vogue interview with Sarah Mower, “This is not an art show. I am selling clothes, so it was going back to things that are minimal and effortless – like a dress people can wear to a wedding and a few times afterwards.”

You can view the latest collection on  JACQUEMUS.COM and pre-order new bags before they sell out on modaoperandi.com.

What do you think? Are you going to grab a new Jacquemus bag for yourself? Let us know in the comments or send us a DM on Instagram!

LOVE DIONNE

P.S. Get celebrity favorite Lash Extensions from D’Lashes. For appointments – Click Here (By Appointment Only). 3: Shop D’Lashes Beauty and A-List Strip Lashes Here.
